name.desc: The name of the emoji to be added (using lower-case letters only). Colons (`:myemoji:`) around the value are not required, although they may be included.

url.desc: The URL of a file to use as an image for the emoji. Square images under 128KB and with transparent backgrounds work best.

errors.emoji_limit_reached: Unable to add emoji due to limit reached.
errors.error_bad_upload: There was an error uploading the image.
errors.error_bad_wide: The image width or height is too large.
errors.error_missing_name: Value passed for `name` is missing or empty.
errors.error_too_big: The image file size is too large.
errors.error_lower_case_names_only: Capital letters are not allowed in emoji names.
errors.failed_to_add_emoji: Failed to add the specified emoji.
errors.failed_to_fetch_active_team: There are no active teams on the org and we need at least one.
errors.feature_not_enabled: The Admin APIs feature is not enabled for this team.
errors.not_an_admin: This method is only accessible by org owners and Admins.
errors.ratelimited: Too many api calls in a time period.
errors.resized_but_still_too_large: The image is still too large after resizing.
errors.too_many_frames: The image has too many frames.
